title: My pixel 4 xl keeps shutting down or won't wake after putting it in my pocket.
content: When I put my pixel 4 xl I. My pocket and start walking around, when I take it out again it will not wake and acts as if it has shit itself down. I've booted into safe mode with the same issue. I have just done a factory reset and I'm still experiencing the issue. This started 2 days ago. Has anybody else experienced this behavior?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
